Their walking pace is synchronized and natural.
No second cat, no background animals, no distant animals.

Fabric moves naturally while walking.

Mystical enchanted forest with moss-covered ancient trees.
Misty green-teal atmosphere.

Giant cat walking slowly, gracefully, and stylishly toward the camera with elegant feline confidence.

Human woman sitting upright on the cat's back/shoulders like a skilled rider.

Calm, powerful, mysterious expression — looking forward with quiet authority.
Body moving naturally with cat's graceful stride.

Low-angle cinematic shot from ground level looking slightly upward.

Woman centered on top of cat, clearly visible as rider.
Strong depth perspective showing scale difference.
Cat and rider approaching camera in dramatic forward motion.

Option 2: Crumbling Victorian architecture, broken stone walls, iron gates, gothic ruins.

Gothic fantasy horror atmosphere with ethereal beauty.

Moss, ivy, and nature reclaiming ancient structures.
